modName: 83Willows - beautiful Nord female - KILEA - Level1 Savegame
summary:
different recommended looks - pictures, links and information included - -

Level 1 Savegame - right after your Escape from Helgen... (I have grabbed all valuable and useful things inside!) + included a full forsworn armor set
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p483/8383Willow/Kilea1.jpg[/img]
Kilea is a beautiful Nord Dragonborn. (Level 1 - saved right after your Escape from Helgen - "UNBOUND")
With her unique face/beauty she looks good with all kinds of makeup and haircolors (take a look at her example IMAGES!!!)

She already wears a forsworn armor - I have included it in her savegame because the headdress is the perfect "hairstyle" for her.
(If you don't want to "cheat" just drop the 4 forsworn items and play a totally regular game with her)
I have saved her with neutral makeup and grey eyes - so everyone can customize her as he/she wants to!


[img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p483/8383Willow/Feedback_2yellow.jpg[/img]
. . . (comments, uploaded images, constructive critizism, . . .)


Official HD DLC Pack Compatibility - Step by Step Guide
If you are using the official HD_Texture_Pack you have to follow this little guide to make it compatible with my Savegame
(because the used Texture-Mods would not show up otherwise)! Dont worry - it is really simple and safe - just follow the 4 steps:

1. Go to your Skyrim.ini, usually located in Documents/My Games/Skyrim. Make a backup!
2. In the Skryim.ini find the section called [Archive], and add the information for the HiResTexturePack.bsa files so that it looks exactly like this:

[Archive]
sResourceArchiveList=Skyrim - Misc.bsa, Skyrim - Shaders.bsa, Skyrim - Textures.bsa, HighResTexturePack01.bsa, HighResTexturePack02.bsa, Skyrim - Interface.bsa, Skyrim - Animations.bsa, Skyrim - Meshes.bsa, Skyrim - Sounds.bsa
sResourceArchiveList2=Skyrim - Voices.bsa, Skyrim - VoicesExtra.bsa

3. Save the .ini with the new settings
4. Disable/Delete HiResTexturePack01.esp and HiResTexturePack02.esp
You don't need them anymore to run the dlc-textures because of the above .ini changes.

[img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p483/8383Willow/Kilea_Mods.jpg[/img]
To customize her and to get the different looks from the image section you need to downlaod the following 4 mods:

>>> Headdress retexture - my own mod to improve the look of the female forsworn headdress
Download your favorite color here (NONREPLACING - All-in-ONE file available!): [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5865]sexy Real Dreadlocks[/url] - Kileas whole look depends on these new textures and colors!

>>> Face + LaceWarpaint: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563]Coverwomen[/url] choose a natural version (I recommend look 3 - but you can also download the old version nr.1)
make sure you download the LACE-WARPAINT (under optional files)

>>> Body-Skintone: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=18]No Dirty Bodies[/url] for her skin - best matching skintone for the "coverwomen"-face retexture

>>> Eyes: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4869]Covereyes[/url] (I really like them but you can also use another type of HD-eye textures...)


[img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p483/8383Willow/Kilea_ingame.jpg[/img]
To change Kilea's looks (Make-up, Eyecolor, Skincolor, NAME) ingame you have to use the game console (its really easy!):

1. to open the console use the tilde-key (~) (left side - above TAB)

2. type in: showracemenu

3. klick the tilde-key again to close the console

4. now you can change her to your likings in the character menu
(just like you would with a normal new character at the beginning of the game)


[img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p483/8383Willow/Kilea_Recommended.jpg[/img]choose a nice (lace)warpaint for her - you can use my pictures to see which colors/styles match her different haircolors best,...

choose her eyecolor - matching or contrasting her haircolor

change the color of her lips (mouth-section)

if you want you can also change her skintone and adjust her weight

5. press R when you are done - and give her a name (Kilea or whatever you like!) - press enter!



Play the game with your new beautiful, customized Dragonborn!

:)



Please leave a comment if you like this savegame!

Upload pictures of your Kilea and her Skyrim-Adventures!

Credits to all modders who created the wonderful mods I used for character creation and screenshots.
A special THANK YOU to [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=2788925]mrLenski[/url] - I'm a big fan of his mods - they totally agree with my understanding of "beauty" ;))

For more infos, mods and images visit my profile: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/938388]83Willow[/url]
[img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p483/8383Willow/Kilea2.jpg[/img]
